name: Grow Flowers
description:
This game was madef for : My First Game Jam: Winter 2023The Theme was: Growth.

This is my 3rd Jam so far, im happy with this proyect, I hope you have some fun playing it :).

Assets:
All graphics,music and code was made by me using a pen tablet and photoshop durint the jam.
The doodle effect Used is from AllInOneSpriteShader Pack.
And the font used for some text is called "Kid Daddy".
